class.name: ch.algotrader.entity.trade.AllocationImpl
class.meta: Represents an allocation to an individual {@link ch.algotrader.entity.Account Account}. If an OrderPreference is defined for an {@link ch.algotrader.enumeration.OrderType OrderType} that sends orders to multiple Accounts (e.g. {@link ch.algotrader.entity.trade.DistributingOrder DistributingOrder}), allocations to different Accounts can be defined. p iNote: the total of all Allocations needs to be 1.0/i

property.name: value
property.meta:
The amount that is allocated to the corresponding Account.

Note: the total of all Allocations needs to be 1.0

many-to-one.name: orderPreference
many-to-one.meta: Contains certain order default values (e.g. quantity, orderType, delays, etc.). Except for the {@link ch.algotrader.enumeration.OrderType OrderType}, all values have to be defined through Properties.

many-to-one.name: account
many-to-one.meta: Represents an actual Account / AccountGroup / AllocationProfile with an external Broker / Bank
